mean_en: ready to forgive people and show them kindness; (of an event) seeming to be lucky, especially because it brings an end to somebody’s problems or suffering
sentence: The old man is merciful so he let turtles free.
sentence_trans: 老人很仁慈，他放生了海龟。
word_etyma: merci=mercy同情 + ful形容词后缀 → merciful仁慈的
